name: Leader Tank!
description:
Game 1/50

Made using the theme "A real-time strategy game where you lead countries with tanks." generated using https://orteil.dashnet.org/gamegen.

Play through levels guiding your followers to the exit, using your cannon to boost your tank about the level, but be careful not to squish your followers by accident! See if you can make it through all 8 levels!

The first game I actually managed to finish! Not the most incredible but hey it works and it can be played from start to end.

This is the first game out of the 50 I plan to release in 2021, we'll see how far I get before I give up.
